feed.title: Allbuy.i.ng - Idea!
feed.subtitle: Hello world! Do you have a dream, passion, or simple desire that you would like to place on the internet. Why not do so now! Invest in your future, and contact Usheninte for your next developer job. Invest in you!

entry.title: #100DaysOfCode Round 2
entry.content:
Today is Day 3 of my second #100DaysOfCode challenge this year. My first ever, began on May 1st 2018 and lasted till August 8th. Coding is fun and exciting, and I am eager to teach a whole new community at my university Lead City, to code and become world-class developers.

What will I be focusing on in this round? Well, here is a list of just a few technologies, I will be working with:

  • MongoDB
  • React
  • Redux
  • Python
  • Flask
  • MongooseJS

Join me as I work to become a world-class developer. It is not going to be easy, but I am willing to put in all the effort needed. I look forward to changing the way Africans interact with the internet, for the better.
entry.summary: Today is Day 3 of my second #100DaysOfCode challenge this year. My first ever, began on May 1st 2018 and lasted till August 8th. Coding is fun and exciting, and I am eager to teach a whole new community at my university Lead City, to code and become world-class developers.

entry.title: What this Site is About!
entry.content:
Welcome to my personal site. The purpose this serves, is highlighting my professional achievements (in the form of my Portfolio, and otherwise), as well as housing thought and blog pieces from me.

This is an entirely personal endeavour - opinions here are mine and original, to the most extent. Please ask for permission before utilizing or quoting any content present on this website.

All Rights Reserved Â© 2018
